dict.acceptation: 感激的，感谢的；令人愉快的；宜人的；荷；

sent.orig: Everything grateful, learn grateful, grateful all make people that you grow up!
sent.trans: 凡事感激，学会感激，感激一切使你成长的人！

sent.orig: I will always be grateful to him. Now I to pay him back.
sent.trans: 我会一直感激他，现在我会尽全力来报答他。

sent.orig: We are grateful to you, teacher.
I will always remember and be grateful for and to you all for your caring.
sent.trans: 我将永远的记著，并感恩你们为我所施与的照顾。

sent.orig: It is a hopeless understatement to say that I am deeply grateful.
sent.trans: 只是一句“我深深地感谢”远不足以表达我的谢意。
